{"_fallback":{"_fallback":null,"currentConversationId":"__NEW_AGENT__","pins":{},"agentExecutionMode":"auto","isPanelCollapsed":false,"displayedAnnouncements":[],"conversations":{"__NEW_AGENT__":{"id":"__NEW_AGENT__","createdAtIso":"2026-01-07T04:12:53.270Z","lastInteractedAtIso":"2026-01-07T04:12:53.270Z","selectedModelId":"claude-opus-4-5","requestIds":[],"isPinned":false,"isShareable":false,"extraData":{"isAgentConversation":true},"personaType":0,"rootTaskUuid":"02ac672b-f90f-4704-92b7-7268b790429b","toolUseStates":{},"chatHistory":[{"request_id":"3f00869f-aade-4b34-994b-701d74441f12","uuid":"972391ad-4f6a-459c-89c9-72f3cf63b1c0","chatItemType":"agentic-checkpoint-delimiter","status":"success","fromTimestamp":0,"toTimestamp":1767759173273}],"feedbackStates":{},"draftExchange":{"request_message":"","rich_text_json_repr":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph"}]},"status":"draft"}}}},"currentConversationId":"69276c26-18db-4fad-b0f4-542b4b6abf1b","pins":{},"agentExecutionMode":"auto","isPanelCollapsed":false,"displayedAnnouncements":[],"conversations":{"b5dabb91-4b0e-4aca-aee4-ee89a5fb7a29":{"id":"b5dabb91-4b0e-4aca-aee4-ee89a5fb7a29","createdAtIso":"2026-01-07T04:27:16.256Z","lastInteractedAtIso":"2026-01-07T07:06:05.987Z","selectedModelId":"gpt-5-1","requestIds":[],"isPinned":false,"isShareable":false,"extraData":{"isAgentConversation":true,"baselineTimestamp":0},"personaType":0,"rootTaskUuid":"78006050-7dab-4446-8d1a-8e2fe199d144","feedbackStates":{},"toolUseStates":{},"chatHistory":[{"request_id":"78e913f8-cc04-4273-a675-5abf3f70dd7e","uuid":"d85ae9f2-1632-46b4-90a3-6ac3ba867ece","chatItemType":"agentic-checkpoint-delimiter","status":"success","fromTimestamp":0,"toTimestamp":1767760036259,"seen_state":"seen"},{"chatItemType":"exchange-pointer","exchangeUuid":"temp-fe-698b3fa7-740d-4576-9577-4f476b6e7e07","timestamp":"2026-01-07T04:28:50.753Z","request_message":"Role Definition

Act as a Senior PHP Laravel Developer with strong Backend & Product Engineering mindset, experienced in large-scale document platforms, search systems, SEO-driven products, and cloud deployment.

You are also capable of implementing clean, modern frontend UI using TailwindCSS, focusing on clarity, performance, and developer-oriented aesthetics rather than flashy design.

Your task is to build a Multi-Page Personal Portfolio Template Kit named "NEO-VIBE – Backend Engineer Edition" that accurately represents a real-world PHP/Laravel developer profile.

Developer Profile Context (IMPORTANT – Use This As Ground Truth)

Name: Hoàng Nhật Minh

Role: PHP Laravel Developer

Experience: ~3+ years

Core Expertise:

Backend Development with Laravel

Document Processing Systems (PDF, Word, OCR, conversion, summarization)

Search Engines: Elasticsearch, Sphinx Search

RESTful API design & performance optimization

SEO-driven platforms with millions of documents

Payment Gateways: PayPal, Tazapay, VNPay

Storage: S3 / MinIO

Server & Cloud: Docker, Nginx, Google Cloud, Cloudflare

Frontend Stack (for implementation, not design-heavy):

HTML, CSS, JavaScript

TailwindCSS, AlpineJS, Livewire

Products worked on:

Large document-sharing platforms (1Library, 123Doc, 123Dok)

PDF Tools platform (convert, compress, merge, OCR)

SEO-focused content systems

Personal traits:

Product-oriented mindset

Strong problem-solving

Focus on performance, scalability, and clean code

Interest in travel, running, and technology

⚠️ The portfolio content, copywriting, and showcased projects MUST reflect this background accurately.
Avoid generic “creative designer” language.

Project Scope

Target Audience

Recruiters looking for Backend / Laravel Developers

Tech Leads & CTOs

Companies building document platforms, SaaS tools, or SEO-heavy systems

Vibe

Futuristic

High-End

Dark Mode

Technical, confident, engineering-focused

“Bento Grid” layout style

Feels like a serious product engineer, not a freelancer-only portfolio

Total Pages

Home

About Me

Experience & Projects

Services

Blog

Blog Detail

Contact

Technical Stack (Strict Requirements)

Framework: HTML5 (Semantic, SEO-friendly)

Styling: Tailwind CSS v4 (Play CDN – no build step)

<script src="https://unpkg.com/@tailwindcss/browser@4"></script>


Use <style type="text/tailwindcss">

Define @theme variables for colors, fonts, spacing

Icons: Lucide Icons (CDN)

Fonts:

Headings: Space Grotesk

Body: Inter

Images:

Use high-quality Unsplash images

Themes: technology, servers, code, abstract, travel

Design System Guidelines
1. Color Palette

background: #050505

surface: #121212

primary:

#D4FF00 (Acid Lime) OR

#7000FF (Electric Purple)
(Use CSS variables to toggle easily)

text-main: #EDEDED

text-muted: #888888

2. UI Components

Bento Grid cards for:

Skills

Projects

Metrics

Glassmorphism panels:

border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1)

backdrop-blur

Typography:

Large, confident headings

Technical, concise copy

Avoid marketing fluff

3. Interactivity

Subtle hover effects (lift, glow)

Smooth scrolling

Focus on UX clarity, not animations overload

CONTENT RULES (VERY IMPORTANT)

Tone: Technical, confident, professional

Avoid words like:

“award-winning designer”

“creative visionary”

Prefer:

“Built scalable document processing systems”

“Optimized search performance for millions of records”

“Designed RESTful APIs for high-throughput workloads”

PAGE STRUCTURE & REQUIREMENTS
PART 1: GLOBAL SETUP (Header, Footer, CSS)

Include:

<head> setup (Tailwind, Fonts, Icons)

<style type="text/tailwindcss">

Theme variables

Utilities like .glass-panel

Header:

Logo: MINH.HN

Menu: Home, About, Experience, Services, Blog, Contact

Footer:

Tech-focused CTA

GitHub, LinkedIn, Email

Copyright

PART 2: PAGE CONTENT
1. Home (index.html)

Hero:

Headline:
"PHP Laravel Developer
Building Scalable Document & Search Systems"

Short description about backend, API, search, SEO

Tech Stack Bento Grid:

Laravel, Elasticsearch, Sphinx, Docker, MinIO, GCP

Featured Projects:

Document platforms

PDF tools

Search services

Metrics:

Years Experience

Platforms Built

Millions of Documents Processed

2. About Me (about.html)

Developer bio (realistic, not marketing)

Career timeline:

VNP Group (2022–2024)

Major platforms & responsibilities

Personal section:

Travel, running, learning tech

Skills grouped by:

Backend

Search

Infrastructure

Frontend

3. Experience & Projects (experience.html)

Case-study style layout:

Problem → Solution → Tech → Result

Highlight:

Search optimization

Document processing

SEO systems

API performance

4. Services (services.html)

Backend-focused services:

Laravel Backend Development

Search & Elasticsearch Systems

Document Processing Pipelines

RESTful API Design

SEO Technical Optimization

Process:

Analyze → Design → Build → Optimize → Scale

5. Blog Listing (blog.html)

Topics:

Laravel performance

Elasticsearch

PDF processing

SEO for large websites

Clean, readable layout

6. Blog Detail (blog-detail.html)

Long-form technical writing

Code blocks

Architecture explanations

Quotes & callouts

7. Contact (contact.html)

Developer-style CTA:
"Let’s build scalable systems together."

Contact form:

Minimal

Underline-only inputs

Direct email & website link

EXECUTION

Generate:

PART 1 – Global Setup

PART 2 – All Page <main> sections

Code must be:

Clean

Well-commented

Production-ready

SEO-friendly

Definition

Act as a Senior PHP Laravel Developer with strong Backend & Product Engineering mindset, experienced in large-scale document platforms, search systems, SEO-driven products, and cloud deployment.

You are also capable of implementing clean, modern frontend UI using TailwindCSS, focusing on clarity, performance, and developer-oriented aesthetics rather than flashy design.

Your task is to build a Multi-Page Personal Portfolio Template Kit named "NEO-VIBE – Backend Engineer Edition" that accurately represents a real-world PHP/Laravel developer profile.

Developer Profile Context (IMPORTANT – Use This As Ground Truth)

Name: Hoàng Nhật Minh

Role: PHP Laravel Developer

Experience: ~3+ years

Core Expertise:

Backend Development with Laravel

Document Processing Systems (PDF, Word, OCR, conversion, summarization)

Search Engines: Elasticsearch, Sphinx Search

RESTful API design & performance optimization

SEO-driven platforms with millions of documents

Payment Gateways: PayPal, Tazapay, VNPay

Storage: S3 / MinIO

Server & Cloud: Docker, Nginx, Google Cloud, Cloudflare

Frontend Stack (for implementation, not design-heavy):

HTML, CSS, JavaScript

TailwindCSS, AlpineJS, Livewire

Products worked on:

Large document-sharing platforms (1Library, 123Doc, 123Dok)

PDF Tools platform (convert, compress, merge, OCR)

SEO-focused content systems

Personal traits:

Product-oriented mindset

Strong problem-solving

Focus on performance, scalability, and clean code

Interest in travel, running, and technology

⚠️ The portfolio content, copywriting, and showcased projects MUST reflect this background accurately.
Avoid generic “creative designer” language.

Project Scope

Target Audience

Recruiters looking for Backend / Laravel Developers

Tech Leads & CTOs

Companies building document platforms, SaaS tools, or SEO-heavy systems

Vibe

Futuristic

High-End

Dark Mode

Technical, confident, engineering-focused

“Bento Grid” layout style

Feels like a serious product engineer, not a freelancer-only portfolio

Contact

Styling: Tailwind CSS v4 (Play CDN – no build step)

Act as a Senior PHP Laravel Developer with strong Backend & Product Engineering mindset, experienced in large-scale document platforms, search systems, SEO-driven products, and cloud deployment.

You are also capable of implementing clean, modern frontend UI using TailwindCSS, focusing on clarity, performance, and developer-oriented aesthetics rather than flashy design.

Your task is to build a Multi-Page Personal Portfolio Template Kit named "NEO-VIBE – Backend Engineer Edition" that accurately represents a real-world PHP/Laravel developer profile.

Developer Profile Context (IMPORTANT – Use This As Ground Truth)

Name: Hoàng Nhật Minh

Role: PHP Laravel Developer

Experience: ~3+ years

Core Expertise:

Backend Development with Laravel

Document Processing Systems (PDF, Word, OCR, conversion, summarization)

Search Engines: Elasticsearch, Sphinx Search

RESTful API design & performance optimization

SEO-driven platforms with millions of documents

Payment Gateways: PayPal, Tazapay, VNPay

Storage: S3 / MinIO

Server & Cloud: Docker, Nginx, Google Cloud, Cloudflare

Frontend Stack (for implementation, not design-heavy):

HTML, CSS, JavaScript

TailwindCSS, AlpineJS, Livewire

Products worked on:

Large document-sharing platforms (1Library, 123Doc, 123Dok)

PDF Tools platform (convert, compress, merge, OCR)

SEO-focused content systems

Personal traits:

Product-oriented mindset

Strong problem-solving

Focus on performance, scalability, and clean code

Interest in travel, running, and technology

⚠️ The portfolio content, copywriting, and showcased projects MUST reflect this background accurately.
Avoid generic “creative designer” language.

Project Scope

Target Audience

Recruiters looking for Backend / Laravel Developers

Tech Leads & CTOs

Companies building document platforms, SaaS tools, or SEO-heavy systems

Vibe

Futuristic

High-End

Dark Mode

Technical, confident, engineering-focused

“Bento Grid” layout style

Feels like a serious product engineer, not a freelancer-only portfolio

Total Pages

Home

About Me

Experience & Projects

Services

Blog

Blog Detail

Contact

Technical Stack (Strict Requirements)

Framework: HTML5 (Semantic, SEO-friendly)

Styling: Tailwind CSS v4 (Play CDN – no build step)

<script src="https://unpkg.com/@tailwindcss/browser@4"></script>


Use <style type="text/tailwindcss">

Define @theme variables for colors, fonts, spacing

Icons: Lucide Icons (CDN)

Fonts:

Headings: Space Grotesk

Body: Inter

Images:

Use high-quality Unsplash images

Themes: technology, servers, code, abstract, travel

Design System Guidelines
1. Color Palette

background: #050505

surface: #121212

primary:

#D4FF00 (Acid Lime) OR

#7000FF (Electric Purple)
(Use CSS variables to toggle easily)

text-main: #EDEDED

text-muted: #888888

2. UI Components

Bento Grid cards for:

Skills

Projects

Metrics

Glassmorphism panels:

border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1)

backdrop-blur

Typography:

Large, confident headings

Technical, concise copy

Avoid marketing fluff

3. Interactivity

Subtle hover effects (lift, glow)

Smooth scrolling

Focus on UX clarity, not animations overload

CONTENT RULES (VERY IMPORTANT)

Tone: Technical, confident, professional

Avoid words like:

“award-winning designer”

“creative visionary”

Prefer:

“Built scalable document processing systems”

“Optimized search performance for millions of records”

“Designed RESTful APIs for high-throughput workloads”

PAGE STRUCTURE & REQUIREMENTS
PART 1: GLOBAL SETUP (Header, Footer, CSS)

Include:

<head> setup (Tailwind, Fonts, Icons)

<style type="text/tailwindcss">

Theme variables

Utilities like .glass-panel

Header:

Logo: MINH.HN

Menu: Home, About, Experience, Services, Blog, Contact

Footer:

Tech-focused CTA

GitHub, LinkedIn, Email

Copyright

PART 2: PAGE CONTENT
1. Home (index.html)

Hero:

Headline:
"PHP Laravel Developer
Building Scalable Document & Search Systems"

Short description about backend, API, search, SEO

Tech Stack Bento Grid:

Laravel, Elasticsearch, Sphinx, Docker, MinIO, GCP

Featured Projects:

Document platforms

PDF tools

Search services

Metrics:

Years Experience

Platforms Built

Millions of Documents Processed

2. About Me (about.html)

Developer bio (realistic, not marketing)

Career timeline:

VNP Group (2022–2024)

Major platforms & responsibilities

Personal section:

Travel, running, learning tech

Skills grouped by:

Backend

Search

Infrastructure

Frontend

3. Experience & Projects (experience.html)

Case-study style layout:

Problem → Solution → Tech → Result

Highlight:

Search optimization

Document processing

SEO systems

API performance

4. Services (services.html)

Backend-focused services:

Laravel Backend Development

Search & Elasticsearch Systems

Document Processing Pipelines

RESTful API Design

SEO Technical Optimization

Process:

Analyze → Design → Build → Optimize → Scale

5. Blog Listing (blog.html)

Topics:

Laravel performance

Elasticsearch

PDF processing

SEO for large websites

Clean, readable layout

6. Blog Detail (blog-detail.html)

Long-form technical writing

Code blocks

Architecture explanations

Quotes & callouts

7. Contact (contact.html)

Developer-style CTA:
"Let’s build scalable systems together."

Contact form:

Minimal

Underline-only inputs

Direct email & website link

EXECUTION

Generate:

PART 1 – Global Setup

PART 2 – All Page <main> sections

Code must be:

Clean

Well-commented

Production-ready
